## AuthGuard class

Used to guard for unauthorized users. Provides both canActivate &amp; canActivateChild

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class AuthGuard implements CanActivate, CanActivateChild 
```
<b>Implements:</b> CanActivate, CanActivateChild

## Remarks

Use route data (see [AuthRouteData](./state-auth.authroutedata.md)<!-- -->) to set allowed roles for the guarded routes.
